SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI

Class VirtualControllerRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI.VirtualControllerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionLayerClient, HeartBeatInterface, VirtualController, ControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class VirtualControllerRMI extends Object implements VirtualController
This class is the RMI implementation of the VirtualController interface. It is used to communicate with the server through RMI.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • VirtualControllerRMI

      public VirtualControllerRMI()
      Constructs a VirtualControllerRMI object. It adds a shutdown hook to the JVM that unexports the view and the VirtualController. It also shuts down the heartBeatExecutor when the JVM is shutting down.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public void login(String nickname)
      Call the login method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      login in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(String gameName, int maxPlayerCount)
      Call the createLobby method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      createLobby in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      gameName - the name of the lobby
      maxPlayerCount - the maximum number of players that can join the lobby

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(String lobbyName)
      Call the joinLobby method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      joinLobby in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby that the player wants to join

    • leaveLobby

      public void leaveLobby()
      Call the leaveLobby method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      leaveLobby in interface ControllerInterface

    • place

      public void place(LightPlacement placement)
      Call the place method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      place in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      placement - the lightPlacement decided by player

    • heartBeat

      public void heartBeat()
      Call the checkEmpty method on the server to check if the connection is still alive. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      heartBeat in interface HeartBeatInterface

    • draw

      public void draw(DrawableCard deckID, int cardID)
      Call the draw method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error and disconnects the client.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      deckID - the deck from which the card is drawn (either Resource or Gold)
      cardID - the position of the card to draw (0,1 for the buffer, 2 for the deck)

    • leave

      public void leave() throws Exception
      Call the leave method of the controller on the server. If the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds, it logs an error It will always call the disconnect method to close the connection and erase the light model
      Specified by:
      leave in interface ControllerInterface
      Throws:
      Exception - if the server does not respond in Configs.secondsTimeOut seconds

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnect the client from the server. It closes the connection and erases the light model. It also transitions to the server connection view.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface VirtualController

    • notifyLostServerConnection

      public void notifyLostServerConnection()
      Notify the client that the connection with the server has been lost.

    • connect

      public void connect(String ip, int port, ViewInterface view)
      /** Constructs a VirtualControllerRMI object. This constructor attempts to set the IP address of the client to the one assigned to the server. If there is no internet connection, it logs an error and transitions to the server connection view. If the connection is successful, it calls System.setProperty to set the IP address of the client to the one assigned by the server.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface ConnectionLayerClient
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP address of the RMI server.
      port - The port number where the RMI server is listening.
      view - the view of the client

    • setControllerStub

      public void setControllerStub(ControllerInterface controllerStub)
      Set the controllerStub of the client to the controllerStub passed as parameter.
      Specified by:
      setControllerStub in interface VirtualController
      Parameters:
      controllerStub - the controllerStub of the client
